radiographic_examinations.findings: Several fluid collections in the pelvis, the largest in the deep pelvis anterior to the rectum. Marked interval collapse in the size of the collection after catheter placement. A moderate-sized hematoma noted in the right piriformis muscle, measuring approximately 6.1 x 9.3 cm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No change in the size of the hematoma noted in the final post-procedure CT.
